name: Super
tagline: Turn your Notion pages into fast, beautiful websites
description: Super transforms your Notion pages into blazing-fast websites with custom domains, SEO optimization, and professional designs. No coding required - just write in Notion and publish instantly.

rawData.description: Super.so is the fastest way to build websites with Notion. Write in Notion, publish with Super. Get blazing fast page loads, SEO optimization, custom domains, and beautiful designs without touching code. Used by thousands of creators, startups, and teams worldwide.
features: Publish Notion pages as websites instantly
Custom meta tags and Open Graph

enhancedContent.overview:
Super transforms your Notion workspace into a professional web presence by converting your Notion pages directly into fast-loading, beautifully designed websites. Rather than forcing you to learn complex web development tools or migrate content to traditional website builders, Super works seamlessly with your existing Notion workflow - simply write and organize your content in Notion as you normally would, then publish it instantly as a fully functional website with professional features.

The platform handles all the technical complexities of modern web publishing, including performance optimization, search engine visibility, and mobile responsiveness, while maintaining the simplicity that makes Notion so powerful. This means you can focus entirely on creating great content and organizing information in Notion, while Super automatically delivers enterprise-grade website performance with sub-second loading times and professional styling.

For Notion users who need to share their work publicly - whether it's documentation, portfolios, blogs, or company websites - Super eliminates the traditional barrier between internal knowledge management and external web presence. You get the best of both worlds: Notion's intuitive content creation experience combined with the speed, SEO capabilities, and professional appearance that modern websites demand.

features: Instant website publishing from Notion pages
Custom domain connection with SSL security
Remove Super branding for clean presentation
Custom meta tags and social media previews

problemsSolved: Complex website creation requiring technical skills and separate content management
Slow loading times and poor SEO performance from basic Notion sharing
Difficulty maintaining professional web presence while using Notion for content creation
Time-consuming process of duplicating content between Notion and traditional websites
solutionsBenefits: Publish professional websites directly from Notion without coding or content migration
Achieve enterprise-grade performance with automatic optimization and global CDN delivery
Maintain consistent branding with custom domains, styling options, and white-label presentation
Streamline workflow by managing all content in Notion while delivering polished public websites
idealFor: Content creators and bloggers who organize their work in Notion
Startups and small businesses using Notion for internal documentation
Freelancers and consultants needing portfolio sites connected to their Notion workspace
Teams creating public-facing documentation, help centers, or knowledge bases
Educators and course creators managing content in Notion
notRecommendedFor: E-commerce businesses needing shopping cart functionality (lacks commerce features)
Organizations requiring complex user authentication systems (limited to basic password protection)

faqs.question: How does this integrate with Notion?
faqs.answer: Super connects directly to your Notion workspace through native integration. You simply share your Notion page with Super, and it automatically converts the content into a website while maintaining real-time synchronization with your Notion updates.

faqs.question: What's the setup time?
faqs.answer: Initial setup takes about 5-10 minutes. You can have a basic website live immediately after connecting your Notion page. Custom domain setup and styling customizations may take an additional 15-30 minutes depending on your requirements.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Super offers a free tier that includes basic website publishing with Super branding. Paid plans start at around $12/month and include custom domains, branding removal, advanced SEO features, and priority support.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases for Notion users?
faqs.answer: Popular use cases include converting Notion documentation into public help centers, transforming personal Notion pages into professional portfolios, publishing blog content directly from Notion databases, and creating company websites that sync with internal Notion workspaces.
